data.actual_result: text appears bolded, unable to click
data.expected_result: user should be able to click
data.short_description: When using the format of [Appear text](link), having the “Appear Text” bolded will not work.
data.steps_to_repro: - have a webhook sent a non-embed with the [**Text**]() form, so you (should) have the ability to click it - try clicking the bold text (hyperlink)
